content: quote: I'm pleasantly surprised to see that the US Navy is still working out of St Mawgan (Joint Maritime Facility St. Mawgan). sadly that is no longer the case. "http://www.stripes.com/article.asp?section=104&article=60070" I was a plank owner at JMF. sad to see it go after such a short amount of time

title: Navy UK Command Disestablished
